charaepi_ch0144_00_lance/2301_1101_0100_:
When [Name:PlayerNickname ] arrived at the
village, Proton immediately called out to them.
charaepi_ch0144_00_lance/2301_1201_0200_:
Hehe... Perfect timing. I’m currently conducting
some business.
charaepi_ch0144_00_lance/2301_1201_0300_:
Have a look. Slowpoke tails are a delicacy, and
I’ll give you a discount if you buy one now!
charaepi_ch0144_00_lance/2301_1201_0400_:
This fine item makes you happier the more you
chew it!
charaepi_ch0144_00_lance/2301_0401_0600_: Hah! Guess I can’t fool you.
charaepi_ch0144_00_lance/2301_0402_0800_: I should have expected you’d be wary.
charaepi_ch0144_00_lance/2301_1201_0900_:
Even though we’re enemies, I must commend
your observation skills. Indeed, this tail is fake.
charaepi_ch0144_00_lance/2301_1201_1000_: Pasio doesn’t have any wild Pokémon...
charaepi_ch0144_00_lance/2301_1201_1100_:
so we made something similar with cheap
materials and are passing them off as the real deal.
charaepi_ch0144_00_lance/2301_0301_1200_: Why do you do all these bad things?
charaepi_ch0144_00_lance/2301_0402_1500_: I won’t quit until I’ve hit my profit targets.
charaepi_ch0144_00_lance/2301_1201_1600_:
I’ve been secretly working with my subordinates to
gather funds and prove myself useful to Giovanni.
charaepi_ch0144_00_lance/2301_1201_1700_:
This place is prime pickings, so we made a
secret underground base.
charaepi_ch0144_00_lance/2301_1201_1800_:
Items to make Pokémon stronger, indulgent
delicacies, rare Pokémon plushies...
charaepi_ch0144_00_lance/2301_1201_1900_: They’re all fake, but business is booming.
charaepi_ch0144_00_lance/2301_1201_2000_:
Oh, and there’s no point in trying to tell me
to stop!
charaepi_ch0144_00_lance/2301_1201_2100_: This is the path I’ve chosen.
charaepi_ch0144_00_lance/2301_1201_2200_: My goal is to be an evil mastermind like Giovanni!
charaepi_ch0144_00_lance/2301_1201_2300_:
I’ve always admired Giovanni—how he can be so
ruthlessly decisive.
charaepi_ch0144_00_lance/2301_1201_2400_:
So I set out to be the scariest and cruelest
guy in Team Rocket, and that’s how I became
an executive!
charaepi_ch0144_00_lance/2301_1201_2500_:
Which is why I can’t betray Giovanni’s trust or the
trust of the subordinates that follow me.
charaepi_ch0144_00_lance/2301_0401_2800_: You’re curious if Golbat was stolen from someone?
charaepi_ch0144_00_lance/2301_0402_3000_: He wasn’t stolen or supplied by Team Rocket.
charaepi_ch0144_00_lance/2301_1201_3100_: I choose the partners I work with!
charaepi_ch0144_00_lance/2301_1201_3200_:
I can’t trust a Pokémon stolen from
someone else or a partner Pokémon
provided by the organization.
charaepi_ch0144_00_lance/2301_1201_3400_:
I caught this Golbat as a Zubat and carefully
raised it myself.
charaepi_ch0144_00_lance/2301_1201_3500_:
If you don’t believe me, would you like to test the
strength of our relationship?
charaepi_ch0144_00_lance/2301_1201_3600_:
We’ve also gained experience by battling
strong sync pairs.
charaepi_ch0144_00_lance/2301_1201_3700_: So we can be even more useful to Giovanni!
